verses.text_plain: These are the statutes and judgments, which ye shall observe to do in the land, which the Lord God of thy fathers giveth thee to possess it, all the days that ye live upon the earth.
verses.verse_html: 1These are the statutes and judgments, which ye shall observe to do in the land, which the Lord God of thy fathers giveth thee to possess it, all the days that ye live upon the earth.

verses.text_plain: Ye shall utterly destroy all the places, wherein the nations which ye shall possess served their gods, upon the high mountains, and upon the hills, and under every green tree:
verses.verse_html:
2Ye shall utterly destroy all the places, wherein the nations which ye shall possess served their gods, upon the high mountains, and upon the hills, and under every green tree: ▼
▼ possess: or, inherit

verses.text_plain: And ye shall overthrow their altars, and break their pillars, and burn their groves with fire; and ye shall hew down the graven images of their gods, and destroy the names of them out of that place.
verses.verse_html:
3And ye shall overthrow their altars, and break their pillars, and burn their groves with fire; and ye shall hew down the graven images of their gods, and destroy the names of them out of that place. ▼
▼ overthrow: Heb. break down

tokens.text: of them out of that place

footnotes.body_html: ▼ overthrow: Heb. break down

verses.text_plain: Ye shall not do so unto the Lord your God.
verses.verse_html: 4Ye shall not do so unto the Lord your God.

verses.text_plain: But unto the place which the Lord your God shall choose out of all your tribes to put his name there, even unto his habitation shall ye seek, and thither thou shalt come:
verses.verse_html: 5But unto the place which the Lord your God shall choose out of all your tribes to put his name there, even unto his habitation shall ye seek, and thither thou shalt come:

verses.text_plain: And thither ye shall bring your burnt offerings, and your sacrifices, and your tithes, and heave offerings of your hand, and your vows, and your freewill offerings, and the firstlings of your herds and of your flocks:
verses.verse_html: 6And thither ye shall bring your burnt offerings, and your sacrifices, and your tithes, and heave offerings of your hand, and your vows, and your freewill offerings, and the firstlings of your herds and of your flocks:

verses.text_plain: And there ye shall eat before the Lord your God, and ye shall rejoice in all that ye put your hand unto, ye and your households, wherein the Lord thy God hath blessed thee.
verses.verse_html: 7And there ye shall eat before the Lord your God, and ye shall rejoice in all that ye put your hand unto, ye and your households, wherein the Lord thy God hath blessed thee.

verses.text_plain: Ye shall not do after all the things that we do here this day, every man whatsoever is right in his own eyes.
verses.verse_html: 8Ye shall not do after all the things that we do here this day, every man whatsoever is right in his own eyes.

verses.text_plain: For ye are not as yet come to the rest and to the inheritance, which the Lord your God giveth you.
verses.verse_html: 9For ye are not as yet come to the rest and to the inheritance, which the Lord your God giveth you.

tokens.text: For ye are not as yet come

verses.text_plain: But when ye go over Jordan, and dwell in the land which the Lord your God giveth you to inherit, and when he giveth you rest from all your enemies round about, so that ye dwell in safety;
verses.verse_html: 10But when ye go over Jordan, and dwell in the land which the Lord your God giveth you to inherit, and when he giveth you rest from all your enemies round about, so that ye dwell in safety;

verses.text_plain: Then there shall be a place which the Lord your God shall choose to cause his name to dwell there; thither shall ye bring all that I command you; your burnt offerings, and your sacrifices, your tithes, and the heave offering of your hand, and all your choice vows which ye vow unto the Lord:
verses.verse_html:
11Then there shall be a place which the Lord your God shall choose to cause his name to dwell there; thither shall ye bring all that I command you; your burnt offerings, and your sacrifices, your tithes, and the heave offering of your hand, and all your choice vows which ye vow unto the Lord: ▼
▼ your choice…: Heb. the choice of your vows

tokens.text: Then there shall be a place

footnotes.body_text: ▼ your choice…: Heb. the choice of your vows
footnotes.body_html: ▼ your choice…: Heb. the choice of your vows

verses.text_plain: And ye shall rejoice before the Lord your God, ye, and your sons, and your daughters, and your menservants, and your maidservants, and the Levite that is within your gates; forasmuch as he hath no part nor inheritance with you.
verses.verse_html: 12And ye shall rejoice before the Lord your God, ye, and your sons, and your daughters, and your menservants, and your maidservants, and the Levite that is within your gates; forasmuch as he hath no part nor inheritance with you.

verses.text_plain: Take heed to thyself that thou offer not thy burnt offerings in every place that thou seest:
verses.verse_html: 13Take heed to thyself that thou offer not thy burnt offerings in every place that thou seest:

verses.text_plain: But in the place which the Lord shall choose in one of thy tribes, there thou shalt offer thy burnt offerings, and there thou shalt do all that I command thee.
verses.verse_html: 14But in the place which the Lord shall choose in one of thy tribes, there thou shalt offer thy burnt offerings, and there thou shalt do all that I command thee.

verses.text_plain: Notwithstanding thou mayest kill and eat flesh in all thy gates, whatsoever thy soul lusteth after, according to the blessing of the Lord thy God which he hath given thee: the unclean and the clean may eat thereof, as of the roebuck, and as of the hart.
verses.verse_html: 15Notwithstanding thou mayest kill and eat flesh in all thy gates, whatsoever thy soul lusteth after, according to the blessing of the Lord thy God which he hath given thee: the unclean and the clean may eat thereof, as of the roebuck, and as of the hart.

verses.text_plain: Only ye shall not eat the blood; ye shall pour it upon the earth as water.
verses.verse_html: 16Only ye shall not eat the blood; ye shall pour it upon the earth as water.

verses.text_plain: Thou mayest not eat within thy gates the tithe of thy corn, or of thy wine, or of thy oil, or the firstlings of thy herds or of thy flock, nor any of thy vows which thou vowest, nor thy freewill offerings, or heave offering of thine hand:
verses.verse_html: 17Thou mayest not eat within thy gates the tithe of thy corn, or of thy wine, or of thy oil, or the firstlings of thy herds or of thy flock, nor any of thy vows which thou vowest, nor thy freewill offerings, or heave offering of thine hand:

verses.text_plain: But thou must eat them before the Lord thy God in the place which the Lord thy God shall choose, thou, and thy son, and thy daughter, and thy manservant, and thy maidservant, and the Levite that is within thy gates: and thou shalt rejoice before the Lord thy God in all that thou puttest thine hands unto.
verses.verse_html: 18But thou must eat them before the Lord thy God in the place which the Lord thy God shall choose, thou, and thy son, and thy daughter, and thy manservant, and thy maidservant, and the Levite that is within thy gates: and thou shalt rejoice before the Lord thy God in all that thou puttest thine hands unto.

verses.text_plain: Take heed to thyself that thou forsake not the Levite as long as thou livest upon the earth.
verses.verse_html:
19Take heed to thyself that thou forsake not the Levite as long as thou livest upon the earth. ▼
▼ as long…: Heb. all thy days

footnotes.body_text: ▼ as long…: Heb. all thy days
footnotes.body_html: ▼ as long…: Heb. all thy days

verses.text_plain: When the Lord thy God shall enlarge thy border, as he hath promised thee, and thou shalt say, I will eat flesh, because thy soul longeth to eat flesh; thou mayest eat flesh, whatsoever thy soul lusteth after.
verses.verse_html: 20When the Lord thy God shall enlarge thy border, as he hath promised thee, and thou shalt say, I will eat flesh, because thy soul longeth to eat flesh; thou mayest eat flesh, whatsoever thy soul lusteth after.

verses.text_plain: If the place which the Lord thy God hath chosen to put his name there be too far from thee, then thou shalt kill of thy herd and of thy flock, which the Lord hath given thee, as I have commanded thee, and thou shalt eat in thy gates whatsoever thy soul lusteth after.
verses.verse_html: 21If the place which the Lord thy God hath chosen to put his name there be too far from thee, then thou shalt kill of thy herd and of thy flock, which the Lord hath given thee, as I have commanded thee, and thou shalt eat in thy gates whatsoever thy soul lusteth after.

tokens.text: from thee, then thou shalt kill

verses.text_plain: Even as the roebuck and the hart is eaten, so thou shalt eat them: the unclean and the clean shall eat of them alike.
verses.verse_html: 22Even as the roebuck and the hart is eaten, so thou shalt eat them: the unclean and the clean shall eat of them alike.

verses.text_plain: Only be sure that thou eat not the blood: for the blood is the life; and thou mayest not eat the life with the flesh.
verses.verse_html:
23Only be sure that thou eat not the blood: for the blood is the life; and thou mayest not eat the life with the flesh. ▼
▼ be…: Heb. be strong

footnotes.body_html: ▼ be…: Heb. be strong

verses.text_plain: Thou shalt not eat it; thou shalt pour it upon the earth as water.
verses.verse_html: 24Thou shalt not eat it; thou shalt pour it upon the earth as water.

verses.text_plain: Thou shalt not eat it; that it may go well with thee, and with thy children after thee, when thou shalt do that which is right in the sight of the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 25Thou shalt not eat it; that it may go well with thee, and with thy children after thee, when thou shalt do that which is right in the sight of the Lord.

tokens.text: it; that it may go well
with thee, and with thy children

verses.text_plain: Only thy holy things which thou hast, and thy vows, thou shalt take, and go unto the place which the Lord shall choose:
verses.verse_html: 26Only thy holy things which thou hast, and thy vows, thou shalt take, and go unto the place which the Lord shall choose:

tokens.text: which thou hast, and thy vows

verses.text_plain: And thou shalt offer thy burnt offerings, the flesh and the blood, upon the altar of the Lord thy God: and the blood of thy sacrifices shall be poured out upon the altar of the Lord thy God, and thou shalt eat the flesh.
verses.verse_html: 27And thou shalt offer thy burnt offerings, the flesh and the blood, upon the altar of the Lord thy God: and the blood of thy sacrifices shall be poured out upon the altar of the Lord thy God, and thou shalt eat the flesh.

verses.text_plain: Observe and hear all these words which I command thee, that it may go well with thee, and with thy children after thee for ever, when thou doest that which is good and right in the sight of the Lord thy God.
verses.verse_html: 28Observe and hear all these words which I command thee, that it may go well with thee, and with thy children after thee for ever, when thou doest that which is good and right in the sight of the Lord thy God.

tokens.text: thee, that it may go well
with thee, and with thy children

verses.text_plain: When the Lord thy God shall cut off the nations from before thee, whither thou goest to possess them, and thou succeedest them, and dwellest in their land;
verses.verse_html:
29When the Lord thy God shall cut off the nations from before thee, whither thou goest to possess them, and thou succeedest them, and dwellest in their land; ▼
▼ succeedest…: Heb. inheritest, or, possessest them

footnotes.body_text: ▼ succeedest…: Heb. inheritest, or, possessest them
footnotes.body_html: ▼ succeedest…: Heb. inheritest, or, possessest them

verses.text_plain: Take heed to thyself that thou be not snared by following them, after that they be destroyed from before thee; and that thou enquire not after their gods, saying, How did these nations serve their gods? even so will I do likewise.
verses.verse_html:
30Take heed to thyself that thou be not snared by following them, after that they be destroyed from before thee; and that thou enquire not after their gods, saying, How did these nations serve their gods? even so will I do likewise. ▼
▼ by…: Heb. after them

tokens.text: to thyself that thou be not snared

footnotes.body_html: ▼ by…: Heb. after them

verses.text_plain: Thou shalt not do so unto the Lord thy God: for every abomination to the Lord, which he hateth, have they done unto their gods; for even their sons and their daughters they have burnt in the fire to their gods.
verses.verse_html:
31Thou shalt not do so unto the Lord thy God: for every abomination to the Lord, which he hateth, have they done unto their gods; for even their sons and their daughters they have burnt in the fire to their gods. ▼
▼ to the: Heb. of the

footnotes.body_html: ▼ to the: Heb. of the

verses.text_plain: What thing soever I command you, observe to do it: thou shalt not add thereto, nor diminish from it.
verses.verse_html: 32What thing soever I command you, observe to do it: thou shalt not add thereto, nor diminish from it.
